evidence.claim: Adelphi Research utilizes Amazon Web Services (AWS) for cloud infrastructure.
The company is HIPAA compliant, ensuring that it handles medical information securely.
They support integration through HL7 standards for health information exchange.
Adelphi Research engages in data interchange using X12 transaction sets.
The company employs various cloud services to optimize healthcare data analysis.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engaging in X12 transactions or use cases related to claim processing.
